testcase.classname: To validate account creation of facebook application
testcase.name: To create new account
testcase.system-out: Given To launch browser and maximize window.................................passed When To launch url of facebook application..................................passed And To click create new account.............................................passed And To pass first name in firstname textbox.................................passed And To pass second name in secondname textbox...............................passed And To pass mobileno or emailid in mobileno or emailid textbox..............passed And To pass new password in password textbox................................passed Then To close the browser...................................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of fb application
testcase.name: To validate login with valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given To launch chrome browser and window maximize..........................passed When To launch url of fb application........................................passed And To pass valid username in email field..................................passed And To pass invalid password in password field..............................passed And To click login button...................................................passed And To check whether navigate to homepage or not............................passed Then To close browser.......................................................passed
